House Bill/Resolution NO. HB00116
FULL TITLE : AN ACT INSTITUTING ABSOLUTE DIVORCE IN THE PHILIPPINES AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
SHORT TITLE : The Absolute Divorce Act Of 2016
ABSTRACT : Gives the espouses opportunity in irremediably failed marriages to secure an absolute divorce decree under limited ground and well-defined procedures to avoid abuse, save the children from the pain and stress of their parents’ marital clashes, and grant the divorced espouses the right to marry again for another chance to achieve marital bliss.
